(xiāngtóng de xiāng)
item.A:
each other; one another; mutually
相同 xiāngtóng identical; same

item.Q:
Write the character: xiàng
(shǒuxiàng de xiàng)
item.A:
appearance; portrait; picture
首相 shǒuxiàng prime minister (of Japan or UK etc)

item.Q:
Write the character: ān
(ānquán de ān)
item.A:
content; calm; still; quiet; to pacify; peace; surname An
安全 ānquán safe; secure; safety; security

item.Q:
Write the character: wú
(wúchǎnjiējí de wú)
item.A:
traditional: 無
-less; not to have; no; none; not; to lack; un-
无产阶级 (無產階級) wúchǎnjiējí proletariat

item.Q:
Write the character: shì
(shìyè de shì)
item.A:
matter; thing; item; work; affair
事业 (事業) shìyè undertaking; project; activity; (charitable, political or revolutionary) cause; publicly funded institution, enterprise or foundation

item.Q:
Write the character: yī
(yīdìng de yī)
item.A:
one; 1; single; a (article); as soon as; entire; whole; all; throughout
一定 yīdìng surely; certainly; necessarily; fixed; a certain (extent etc); given; particular

item.Q:
Write the character: dàn
(yīdàn de dàn)
item.A:
dawn; morning; day-break; day
一旦 yīdàn in case (something happens); once (something becomes true, then...); in one day

item.Q:
Write the character: dǎ
(dǎjī de dǎ)
item.A:
to beat; to strike; to hit; to break; to type; to mix up; to build; to fight; to fetch; to make; to tie up; to issue; to shoot; to calculate; since; from
打击 (打擊) dǎjī to hit; to strike; to attack

item.Q:
Write the character: jìa
(zhījìa de jìa)
item.A:
to support; frame; rack; framework; classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc
支架 zhījìa kickstand

item.Q:
Write the character: hù
(hùxiāng de hù)
item.A:
mutual
互相 hùxiāng each other; mutually; mutual

item.Q:
Write the character: xiāng
(xiāngtóng de xiāng)
item.A:
each other; one another; mutually
相同 xiāngtóng identical; same

item.Q:
Write the character: xiàng
(shǒuxiàng de xiàng)
item.A:
appearance; portrait; picture
首相 shǒuxiàng prime minister (of Japan or UK etc)

item.Q:
Write the character: cán
(cánkù de cán)
item.A:
残 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 殘
to destroy; to spoil; to ruin; to injure; cruel; oppressive; savage; brutal; incomplete; disabled; to remain; to survive; remnant; surplus
残酷 (殘酷) cánkù cruel; cruelty

item.Q:
Write the character: shā
(shāsǐ de shā)
item.A:
traditional: 殺
to kill; to murder; to slaughter
杀死 (殺死) shāsǐ to kill

item.Q:
Write the character: zuò
(zàizuò de zuò)
item.A:
seat; base; stand; classifier for buildings, mountains, large solid things etc
在座 zàizuò be present

item.Q:
Write the character: dú
(dúlì de dú)
item.A:
独 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 獨
alone; independent; single; sole; only
独立 (獨立) dúlì independent; independence; to stand alone

item.Q:
Write the character: mù
(mùcái de mù)
item.A:
tree; wood
木材 mùcái wood

item.Q:
Write the character: qiáo
(Lúgōuqiáo de qiáo)
item.A:
桥 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 橋
bridge
芦沟桥 (蘆溝橋) Lúgōuqiáo Lugou bridge or Marco Polo bridge, the scene of "incident" sparking WW2 between Japan and China

樵 (strokes unavailable)
firewood; gather wood

item.Q:
Write the character: yú
(yúyè de yú)
item.A:
渔 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 漁
fisherman; to fish
渔业 (漁業) yúyè fishing industry; fishery

item.Q:
Write the character: qiáo
(Lúgōuqiáo de qiáo)
item.A:
桥 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 橋
bridge
芦沟桥 (蘆溝橋) Lúgōuqiáo Lugou bridge or Marco Polo bridge, the scene of "incident" sparking WW2 between Japan and China

item.Q:
Write the character: xīn
(zhōngxīn de xīn)
item.A:
heart; mind
中心 zhōngxīn center; heart; core

item.A:

相同 xiāngtóng identical; same

item.Q:

item.A:
appearance; portrait; picture
首相 shǒuxiàng prime minister (of Japan or UK etc)

item.Q:
Write the character: yù
(yùdào de yù)
item.A:
遇 (strokes unavailable)
meet with; how one is treated; an opportunity; surname Yu
遇到 yùdào to meet; to run into; to come across

item.Q:
Write the character: kè
(kèguān de kè)
item.A:
customer; visitor; guest
客观 (客觀) kèguān objective

item.Q:
Write the character: qì
(kōngqì de qì)
item.A:
traditional: 氣
gas; air; smell; weather; vital breath; to anger; to get angry; to be enraged
空气 (空氣) kōngqì air; atmosphere

item.Q:
Write the character: tuì
(tuìchū de tuì)
item.A:
退 (strokes unavailable)
retreat; to decline; to move back; to withdraw
退出 tuìchū to withdraw; to abort; to quit

item.Q:
Write the character: huí
(huílai de huí)
item.A:
to circle; to go back; to turn around; to answer; to return; to revolve; Islam; time; classifier for acts of a play; section or chapter (of a classic book)
回来 (回來) huílai return; come back

item.Q:
Write the character: ràng
(ràngbù de ràng)
item.A:
traditional: 讓
to ask; to let (sb do something); to cause (sb to do something); to have (sb do something); to yield; to allow; to permit
让步 (讓步) ràngbù (make a) concession; to give in; to yield

item.Q:
Write the character: xiān
(shǒuxiān de xiān)
item.A:
early; prior; former; in advance; first
首先 shǒuxiān first (of all); in the first place
(once) again; also; both... and...; again

item.Q:
Write the character: Tú
(túshā de Tú)
item.A:
屠 (strokes unavailable)
surname Tu
屠杀 (屠殺) túshā massacre

item.Q:
Write the character: tú
(túshā de tú)
item.A:
屠 (strokes unavailable)
slaughter; slaughter man
屠杀 (屠殺) túshā massacre

(nóngmín de nóng)
item.A:
traditional: 農
agriculture
农民 (農民) nóngmín peasant

Write the character: réng

item.A:
still; yet; to remain

item.Q:
Write the character: rán
(ránhòu de rán)
item.A:
correct; right; so; thus; like this; -ly

item.Q:
Write the character: chǔ
(chǔlǐ de chǔ)
item.A:
traditional: 處
to reside; to live; to dwell; to be in; to stay; get along with; to be in a position of; deal with
处理 (處理) chǔlǐ to handle; to treat; to deal with; to process

item.Q:
Write the character: chù
(dàochù de chù)
item.A:
traditional: 處
a place; location; spot; point; (classifier for locations or items of damage); office; department; bureau; respect
到处 (到處) dàochù in all places; everywhere

item.Q:
Write the character: duì
(fǎnduì de duì)
item.A:
traditional: 對
couple; pair; to be opposite; to oppose; to face; for; to; correct (answer); to answer; to reply; to direct (towards sth); right
反对 (反對) fǎnduì to fight against; to oppose; to be opposed to; opposition

item.Q:
Write the character: hǎo
(hǎode de hǎo)
item.A:
good; well
好的 hǎode (adj) OK

item.Q:
Write the character: hào
(àihào de hào)
item.A:
to be fond of
爱好 (愛好) àihào to like; to be fond of; to be keen on; interest; hobby

item.Q:
Write the character: chǔ
(chǔlǐ de chǔ)
item.A:
traditional: 處
to reside; to live; to dwell; to be in; to stay; get along with; to be in a position of; deal with
处理 (處理) chǔlǐ to handle; to treat; to deal with; to process

item.A:
traditional: 處
a place; location; spot; point; (classifier for locations or items of damage); office; department; bureau; respect

item.Q:
Write the character: jiān
(jiānchí de jiān)
item.A:
坚 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 堅
strong; solid; firm; unyielding; resolute
坚持 (堅持) jiānchí to continue upholding; to remain committed to; persistence; to persist; to uphold; to insist on; persevere

item.Q:
Write the character: chí
(bǎochí de chí)
item.A:
to grasp; to hold; support; manage; direct; maintain
保持 bǎochí to keep; to maintain; to hold; to preserve

item.Q:
Write the character: lì
(shènglì de lì)
item.A:
advantage; benefit; profit; sharp
胜利 (勝利) shènglì victory

item.Q:
Write the character: yì
(lìyì de yì)
item.A:
益 (strokes unavailable)
benefit; increase
利益 lìyì benefit; (in sb's) interest

item.Q:
Write the character: lián
(liánxù de lián)
item.A:
连 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 連
surname Lian; even; as; join; to link; successively
连续 (連續) liánxù continuous; in a row

item.Q:
Write the character: shòu
(shòudào de shòu)
item.A:
to receive; to accept; to suffer; subjected to; to bear; to stand; pleasant; (passive marker)
受到 shòudào to receive; to suffer; obtained; given

item.Q:
Write the character: hài
(wēihài de hài)
item.A:
to do harm to; to cause trouble to; harm; evil; calamity
危害 wēihài to jeopardize; to harm; to endanger
qíguài strange; odd
zuǐbā mouth
píngcháng ordinary; common; usually; ordinarily
yīdàn in case (something happens); once (something becomes true, then...); in one day
dǎjìa fight; scuffle; come to blows
hùxiāng each other; mutually; mutual

traditional: 殘殺
cánshā massacre

traditional: 獨木橋
dúmùqiáo lit. a log bridge; fig. a tricky path; to walk a tight-rope
qiáofū woodman

traditional: 漁夫
yúfū fisherman
xiāngyù to meet; to come across

traditional: 客氣
kèqi polite
kèqì polite
tuìhuí to return
túfū butcher

traditional: 農夫
nóngfū peasant; farmer
réngrán still; yet

traditional: 相處
xiāngchǔ get along with each other

traditional: 好處
hǎochu benefit; advantage

traditional: 堅持
jiānchí to continue upholding; to remain committed to; persistence; to persist; to uphold; to insist on; persevere
lìyì benefit; (in sb's) interest
shòuhài to suffer damage, injury etc; damaged; injured; killed; robbed
